question: I didn't go to the mall. I thought it closed at 5pm. In fact, it closed at 7pm.

answers.text: If I had known the mall closed at 7pm, I would've gone.
If I knew the mall would have closed at 7pm, I would've gone.
I would've gone to the mall if I know it had closed at 7pm.

correct_answer: If I had known the mall closed at 7pm, I would've gone.
